Structs/RTCError.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK8RTCErr.name: offerCreation
Structs/RTCError.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK8RTCErr.abstract: Indicates an offer has failed to be created.

Structs/RTCError.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK8RTCErr.name: invalidPeer
Structs/RTCError.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK8RTCErr.abstract: Indicates that the peer connection is nil.

Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK.name: parsePayload()
Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK.abstract: Format a RTC payload into a RTC Offer Message given to informations.

Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK.name: parse(payload:)
Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK.abstract: Parse Swift dictionnary [String: Any] to instantiate a RTC Offer Message.

Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html#/s:7Ziw.name: parsePayload()
Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html#/s:7Ziw.abstract: Format a RTC payload into a RTC Candidate Message given to informations.

Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html#/s:7Ziw.name: parse(payload:)
Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html#/s:7Ziw.abstract: Parse Swift dictionnary [String: Any] to instantiate a RTC Candidate Message.

Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSD.name: parsePayload()
Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSD.abstract: Format a RTC payload into a RTC Answer Message given to informations.

Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSD.name: parse(payload:)
Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html#/s:7ZiwoSD.abstract: Parse Swift dictionnary [String: Any] to instantiate a RTC Answer Message.

Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html.name: RTCAnswerMessage
Structs/RTCAnswerMessage.html.abstract: Type used to handle RTC Candidates received by GoogleRTC external lib.

Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html.name: RTCCandidateMessage
Structs/RTCCandidateMessage.html.abstract: Type used to handle RTC Candidates received by GoogleRTC external lib.

Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html.name: RTCOfferMessage
Structs/RTCOfferMessage.html.abstract: Type used to handle RTC Candidates received by GoogleRTC external lib.

Structs/RTCError.html.name: RTCError
Structs/RTCError.html.abstract: Error structure used to check validity RTC Client informations.

Structs/RTCMessage.html.name: RTCMessage
Structs/RTCMessage.html.abstract: Protocol that parse GoogleRTC messages in order to build RTC messages to handle peer candidates & offers/answers.

Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.name: vertoClientIsReady()
Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.abstract: Triggered when Verto has been fully initialized and is ready.

Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.name: vertoCallStarted()
Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.abstract: Triggered when a call has successfully started.

Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.name: vertoReceivedCall(callerID:)
Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html#/s:7Zi.abstract: Triggered when the agent receive a incoming call.

Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.name: vertoClientReady()
Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Triggered Verto has been initialized and is ready.

Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.name: vertoCallStarted(callID:sdp:)
Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Triggered when a call between an agent A and agent B has started.

Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.name: vertoAnsweringCall(callID:callerName:sdp:)
Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Triggered when the agent answer an incoming call.

Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.name: vertoCallDisplay()
Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Triggered when all the Verto/RTC initialization part has been done and the call is ready to be displayed.

Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html#/s:7Ziw.name: logMessage(_:)
Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html#/s:7Ziw.abstract: Describe the generation of a specific message (answer or offer)

Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html#/s:7Ziw.name: closeConnection()
Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html#/s:7Ziw.abstract: Triggered when the RTC Client has closed or losed the connection.

Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html.name: RTCClientDelegate
Protocols/RTCClientDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol used to display different interaction of the RTC Client.

Protocols/RTCMessageBuilderProtocol.html.name: RTCMessageBuilderProtocol
Protocols/RTCMessageBuilderProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that builds RTC Client messages to handle peer candidates & offers/answers.

Protocols/RTCMessageParserProtocol.html.name: RTCMessageParserProtocol
Protocols/RTCMessageParserProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that parse GoogleRTC messages in order to build RTC messages to handle peer candidates & offers/answers.

Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html.name: VertoWebSocketDelegate
Protocols/VertoWebSocketDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol that handle both websocket connection state and Verto callbacks during its initialization and during a lifetime of a call.

Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html.name: ZiwoClientDelegate
Protocols/ZiwoClientDelegate.html.abstract: ZiwoClientDelegate protocol will both notify about websocket connections state and call events.

Extensions/Defaults/Keys.html#/s:8Defaul.name: domain
Extensions/Defaults/Keys.html#/s:8Defaul.abstract: Ziwo domain the app is linked to

Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.name: ClientReady
Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.abstract: Triggered when the Verto client has been initialized with (VertoWebSocket).sendLoginRequest().

Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.name: Media
Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.abstract: Triggered Verto is ready to connect the call. The payload contain a SDP and the callID.

Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.name: Invite
Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.abstract: Triggered when the call has been successfully created.

Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.name: Display
Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.abstract: Triggered when the agent receive a call.

Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.name: Bye
Enums/VertoEvent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK10Verto.abstract: Triggered when the call has been terminated.

Enums/VertoEvent.html.name: VertoEvent
Enums/VertoEvent.html.abstract: Verto methods that are used during a call. To understand WebRTC negociation through SDP, please check this website.

Enums/SocketEvent.html.name: SocketEvent
Enums/SocketEvent.html.abstract: Used to handle different type of message through RTC Client.

Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC6doma.name: domain
Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC6doma.abstract: Ziwo domain to which the agent is logged on.

Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC8setA.name: setAgent(agent:)
Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC8setA.abstract: Sets the agent in both UserDefaults and ZiwoSDK singleton class.

Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC10cle.name: clearAgent()
Classes/ZiwoSDK.html#/s:7ZiwoSDKAAC10cle.abstract: Method that will have to be called after logging out an agent to clear all datas.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: delegate
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: ZiwoClientDelegate protocol will both notify about websocket connections state and call events.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: vertoDebug
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Boolean that define whether the debug logs of Verto websocket has to be displayed in console or not.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: initializeClient()
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Method that initialize and configure the Ziwo client.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: initializeVertoWebSocket()
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Private method that instanciate VertoWebSocket and connect it to the correct endpoint based on the Ziwo domain.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: call(number:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Call an agent or an external number (has to be in international format).

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: setSpeakerEnabled(callID:_:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Define the state of the speaker mode (activated / deactivated).

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: setMuteEnabled(callID:_:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Define the state of the microphone (activated / deactivated).

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: setPauseEnabled(callID:_:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Method to modify the state of the call to hold or unhold.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: isSpeakerOn(callID:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: To know if the speaker mode is enabled or not.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: isPaused(callID:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: To know if the call is on hold state.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: isMuteOn(callID:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: To know if the microphone is muted for this call.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.name: findCall(callID:)
Classes/ZiwoClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Allow user to retrieve a call in the active call list.

Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.name: webSocket
Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.abstract: The websocket connected to Verto or the Ziwo domain.

Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.name: debug
Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.abstract: Boolean that activate / deactivate the debug mode.

Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.name: printLog(message:)
Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK0A.abstract: Parent method that prints log of VertoWebSocket and DomainWebSocket classes.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: delegate
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Protocol that handle both websocket connection state and Verto callbacks during its initialization and during a lifetime of a call.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sessId
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: ID of the Verto session defined after a login request (func sendLoginRequest())

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: init(url:delegate:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Class initializer that create the websocket and connect the delegate.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: parseMessage(_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: This methods parses the messages received by the Verto websocket.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: parseSocketMessage(_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Given a dictionnary received by the websocket, extract the ID of the Verto session and store it in sessId.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: parseVertoEvent(_:_:_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Format a Verto event from a message that have been parsed (by func parseMessage(_ message: String)) to handle the behavior and call the correct delegate.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendLoginRequest()
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to authenticate the agent.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendCallCreation(callRPC:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to initiate (the key method will have the value invite)

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendCallAnswer(_:_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to initiate (the key method will have the value invite)

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: hangup(callID:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to terminate the call.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendBackInvite(_:_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to indicate that the agent is callable.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendBackDisplay(_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to indicate that everything is set and the call is ready to be displayed.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendHoldAction(callID:_:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to hold or unhold a call.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: sendDigit(callID:number:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to send a digit to a call.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: blindTransfer(callID:number:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Sends a JSON RPC to Verto protocol to indicate that the call has to be transfer to a designed number.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.name: didReceive(event:client:)
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK1.abstract: Delegate that will trigger VertoWebSocket delegates (websocket state, received messages from Verto protocol).

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: stunServerURL
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Default stun server

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: mediaConstraints
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Default media constraint. Set to only receive audio.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: peerConnection
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: RTC peer connection.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: connectionFactory
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: RTC peer connection factory.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: audioLocalStream
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: RTC local stream.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: audioQueue
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: rtcAudioSession
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: delegate
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/RTCClient.html#/c:@M@ZiwoSDK@obj.name: init()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/c:@M@ZiwoSDK@obj.abstract: The RTC Client initialization perfom two main tasks. It setups the RTC peer connection first then configure the RTC ausio session.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: setupRTCPeerConnection()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Setup the RTC peer connection. RTC configuration is locked for the moment and a default stun server is provided.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: configureAudioSession()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Configures the audio session for the WebRTC connection setting the AVAudioSession mode to voice chat.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: createLocalStream()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Creates and configure a local stream that will be used linked to the peer connection.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: setMicrophoneEnabled(_:)
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Add or remove local stream to the peer connection that enable microphone input.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: setLocalDescription(sessionDescription:)
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Sets a SDP (RTCSessionDescription) as local session description.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: setRemoteDescription(type:sdp:)
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Sets a SDP (RTCSessionDescription) as remote session description.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: createAnswer()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Uses the WebRTC peer connection to create an answer in order to respond to a received offer and initialize a call.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: createOffer()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Uses the WebRTC peer connection to create an offer in order to initiate a call.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: addCandidate(candidateMessage:)
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Adds a candidate to the peer connection.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: logMessage(_:)
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Logs message whenever the RTC Client receive or send a message.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: closeConnection()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Triggered when the connection is terminated.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: speakerOff()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Fallback to the default playing device: headphones / bluetooth / ear speaker.

Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.name: speakerOn()
Classes/RTCClient.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK9RTCCl.abstract: Set audio configuration to speaker.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC9rtcC.name: rtcClient
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC9rtcC.abstract: Instance of RTC Client. Each call has one RTC Client attached.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC8isPa.name: isPaused
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC8isPa.abstract: Is the call on hold state or not.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC7isMu.name: isMuted
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC7isMu.abstract: Is the microphone muted on this call or not.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC6sess.name: sessID
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC6sess.abstract: Verto session ID to which the call is linked.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC6call.name: init(callID:sessID:callerName:recipientName:)
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC6call.abstract: Initializes a new call according to given informations.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC20set.name: setMicrophoneEnabled(_:)
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC20set.abstract: Method to set activity of the microphone during a call.

Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC13set.name: setSpeakerOff()
Classes/Call.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK4CallC13set.abstract: Switch the audio call on internal speaker.

Classes/Agent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK5AgentC2id.name: init(id:email:firstName:lastName:ccPassword:ccLogin:)
Classes/Agent.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK5AgentC2id.abstract: Initializes a new agent according to given informations.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: convertStringToDictionary(_:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Generic method that convert a string into a swift dictionary. This helps to parse messages from the Verto websocket.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: getLoginRPC(ccLogin:ccPassword:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to log user on Verto.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: createCallRPC(method:agentEmail:sdp:sessId:callID:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to initiate either a call creation (verto.invite) or answer a call (verto.answer) on Verto.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: createHoldAction(agentEmail:sessId:callID:isOn:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to hold or unhold a call.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: sendDigit(agentEmail:sessId:callID:number:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to send a digit to the Verto protocol via a call.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: blindTransfer(agentEmail:sessId:callID:number:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to transfer a call without attendance.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: callAnswer(id:method:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to indicate the Verto protocol that the agent has accepted the call.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.name: hangupCall(agentEmail:callID:sessId:)
Classes/VertoHelpers.html#/s:7ZiwoSDK12V.abstract: Format a RPC-JSON to terminate the call.

Classes/VertoHelpers.html.name: VertoHelpers
Classes/VertoHelpers.html.abstract: This class helps to format well-formatted JSON-RPC in order to communicate with Verto protocol.

Classes/Call.html.name: Call
Classes/Call.html.abstract: Represent each call that agent will pass or receive.

Classes/RTCClient.html.name: RTCClient
Classes/RTCClient.html.abstract: Class that manage all the RTC part of the SDK.

Classes/VertoWebSocket.html.name: VertoWebSocket
Classes/VertoWebSocket.html.abstract: Subclass of ZiwoWebSocket that uses websockets to help the communication between the protocol Verto and iOS.

Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html.name: ZiwoWebSocket
Classes/ZiwoWebSocket.html.abstract: ZiwoWebSocket is the parent class of DomainWebSocket and VertoWebSocket that contain the web socket of those two classes.

Classes/ZiwoClient.html.name: ZiwoClient
Classes/ZiwoClient.html.abstract: ZiwoClient is the main class of the SDK. Through this class, the websocket that will be used to communicate with Verto will be initialized.

Classes/ZiwoSDK.html.name: ZiwoSDK
Classes/ZiwoSDK.html.abstract: The ZiwoSDK class is a singleton that is mainly use to retrieve Ziwo related datas once the Agent is logged.
